snippet: If you are proactive against germs and plan for emergencies, you can protect your health when you travel.
abstract: Business travelers can avoid becoming sick from frequent trips if they follow some proactive tips to protect against germs; those who do get sick can mitigate the damage to themselves and their travels with proper planning.
lead_paragraph: If you are proactive against germs and plan for emergencies, you can protect your health when you travel.

headline.seo: Fighting Illness and Germs on the Road
headline.main: Your Road Buddies: Zillions of Germs
headline.print_headline: Your Road Buddies: Zillions of Germs
